name: The Hazel
desc: The Hazel bed strikes a fine balance between traditional and contemporary, making it fit in well with most interior styles.

name: The Hesper
desc: With its clean lines and square head, this eye-catching adjustable bed will be perfectly at home in any contemporary setting.

name: The Oysterwood
subheading: A Versatile Bed With Plenty of Style
desc: One of the more recent additions to the Oak Tree Mobility family, the Oysterwood is a versatile option for any bedroom setting.

name: The Poplar
desc: Featuring a full base that allows for various configurations of under-bed storage, a good choice for those who might be short on space.

name: The Birch
desc: If you favour simpler and more traditional-looking furniture, youâ€™ll like the classic styling of the Birch adjustable bed.

name: The Lilac
desc: With its solid, regal lines and plump head and footboard, this classic choice will bring you long-lasting style and durability.
